title: Michael Jordan, NFL trade rumors, college sports
itunes:title: Michael Jordan, NFL trade rumors, college sports
description:
Colin explains why the Chicago Bulls documentary wont change your mind about Michael Jordan, the obstacles that great team had to overcome, why some college sports need to stop relying on football to pay for them, and how you can some times tell where a trade rumor is coming from. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Greg Cosell, Brian Kelly, and Sam Smith.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
